author: John Linn
content:
I agree with everything you are saying and doing... Flickr is (nearly) automatically uploaded from Lightroom as back-up and I occasionally get an image noticed there. I get the feeling that some people watch the Flickr "What's New" feed and randomly pick images that are interesting, but their real motivation is to lure you to THEIR pictures so they can get noticed. 

Maybe I am wrong. 

It is OK though... having he backups is nice.

I still have a few images on 500px too but not much action there either.
